page.title: 09THE HOLLOW TREE
page.content:
In the tree, Dark and cold. Dirt all around us, Spiders crawling in the cracks, Everywhere about us, Up above the tree so high, In the sun by the sky. Branchs leading here and there, Sticking out leaves everywhere.
The hollow tree is visited by a lot of children who use it as a camp and to climb on.The tree has a lot of space inside. The hollow tree is near the lake and is just to the left of the bridge. The girth of the tree is 9.3 metres. The perimeter of the canopy cover is 67 metres. The height of the tree is about 18 to 19 metres. Some children call it the Echo Tree.
